alert.note: Alert for Ashley (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 03 at 5:00AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Ashley County through 515 AM CST... At 500 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Fountain Hill, or 10 miles north of Hamburg, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Ashley County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 AM CST for southeastern Arkansas.
